title: From MY Window - Minata Sartori
description: Professional portfolio website for photographer and filmmaker Minata Sartori. Multi-page site featuring photography galleries, video projects, and radio work. Fully responsive with interactive media players.

title: Trixie Conciergerie
description: Luxury concierge services website for Saint-Tropez. Features booking system, service management, cleaning, gardening, and property maintenance. Modern responsive design with SEO optimization.

title: Miss Boat
description: Boat rental website for Cavalaire-sur-Mer (French Riviera). License-free boat rentals for ages 16+. Built with Vue.js, Vue Router, and Tailwind CSS. Features pricing page, gallery, contact information, and responsive design.

title: Elsa Psychologue
description: Professional website for psychologist Elsa. Clean and calming design with appointment booking, therapy information, and contact details. Built with modern web technologies and Firebase hosting.

title: Les Planches
description: Mediterranean restaurant website in Cavalaire-sur-Mer. Features animated image galleries for menu and drinks, smooth scroll effects, and responsive design. Modern tapas and wine bar near Saint-Tropez.

title: Re-Fresh Earth
description: Environmental platform fighting urban heat islands using AI and satellite data. NASA Space Apps Challenge project featuring predictive machine learning, real-time thermal mapping with Landsat/Sentinel-2/MODIS, and intuitive dashboard for urban planners. Case study: MÃ¡laga.

title: get_next_line
description: Function that reads a line from a file descriptor. A challenging project that handles buffer management and memory allocation.

title: ft_printf
description: Custom implementation of the printf function in C. Handles multiple format specifiers and conversions.

title: Libft
description: Custom C library with reimplemented standard functions. Foundation library for all future C projects.

title: Personal Libft
description: Extended version of the standard C library with additional utility functions. Enhanced libft with custom implementations for advanced string manipulation, memory management, and data structures.

title: push_swap
description: Sorting algorithm project that sorts data on a stack with a limited set of instructions. Implements efficient algorithms to sort integers using two stacks and specific operations.

title: so_long
description: 2D game project built with MiniLibX. Create a small game where a character collects items and finds an exit. Focuses on graphics programming, event handling, and game logic.

title: Random RGB Generator
description: Interactive RGB color generator that creates random color combinations. Displays the color preview in real-time and provides one-click copying of RGB values for easy use in design projects.

title: Form Validation with Regex
description: Advanced form validation system using regular expressions. Demonstrates real-time input validation for email, phone numbers, passwords, and other common form fields with custom regex patterns.

title: Secure Password Generator
description: Customizable password generator with configurable options. Create strong, secure passwords by choosing the length and character types: uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

title: Projet Sortir
description: Event management platform built with Symfony. Allows users to create, manage, and join social events. Features user authentication, event filtering, and CRUD operations with MySQL database.

title: Series Manager
description: TV series tracking application built with Symfony. Manage your favorite shows, track watched episodes, and discover new series. Features API integration for series data and user watchlists.

title: Philosophers
description: Dining philosophers concurrency project implemented in C using pthreads and mutexes. Simulation of N philosophers avoiding deadlock and starvation.

title: Minishell
description: A minimal shell implementation in C supporting parsing, execution, redirections, and builtins. Educational project following strict coding rules.
